reviewText: I have never purchased a DVD set before so I didn't know what to expect.  I was very pleased.  Each DVD has it's own spot in the case.  All three DVDs work great!  Thanks.
I originally purchased this triple feature DVD package primarily for Primal Fear.  But the other two movies are great as well, and the price was right.  Can't lose with an Ed Norton movie!

I bought this triple set because it said that Primal Fear was in widescreen version enhanced for 16:9 TVs.  Well, that's not true.  Although Primal Fear is in 1.85:1 widescreen; however, it is the same as the previously issued DVD, which is not enhanced for 16:9 TVs.
Who doesn't love Edward Norton in all movies all the time!
A great collection of Edward Norton's movies.

This is a great triple feature with great heist plots and great actors.... Totally worth the $.
The only thing I would change is the widescreen presentation. The widescreen presentation is one of the worst inventions to touch film. I only wish this film set had the option to view the films in full screen.
I would recommend this set to, EVERYONE!! Something for all. Mark Wahlberg, Richard Gere, Robert De Niro?! Yeah, enough said!
I Like Edward Norton as a actor, and all of these movies had him in it, it was a good movie choose all of these movies were.
